attributes.action: MP's should resign from private companies
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned, demand that all MP's should resign their position from all businesses upon election, excepting for independant family interests.

They should be barred from taking payment from any entity outside government, whilst in office. Any company whatsoever, with which the MP or their family members have been, or, are associated, shall be barred from applying for or being awarded any Government contract or funds for the duration of public office and for five years after termination of office
